segments.text: more and more Chinese are marrying foreigners .

segments.text: that's true . But I have a low opinion of those women who go out with foreigners .

segments.text: I wouldn't say that's totally true . I've met many happy intercultural couples .

segments.text: well , then why aren't there many East-West couples where the man is a Chinese and the woman is a Westerner ?
